snippet: The Iranian official, Hossam Khosh Newes, was reported killed while driving from Syria to Lebanon, in reports that drew attention to suspicions of Iran’s role in the Syrian civil war.
abstract: At least one senior Iranian official is reported killed in attack while driving from Syria to Lebanon, which draws attention to suspicions of Iran's role in Syrian civil war.
lead_paragraph: The Iranian official, Hossam Khosh Newes, was reported killed while driving from Syria to Lebanon, in reports that drew attention to suspicions of Iran’s role in the Syrian civil war.

headline.seo: Iranian Reported Killed Near Syrian Border
